title: Do i have to take people serious that call me bad in League?
body:
So I played league today, im currently plat 4 and i wasnt really having my good games... i went on a loosing streak but in my opinion i gave it my best shot.. i didnt flame (thats just stupid to do) i didnt int on purpose and i tried my best to focus.. sadly we lost anyway and a few teammates called me a bad player and to never play a champion again. Now i know i shouldnt take it serious but yet it made me question myself. One player even went as far as adding me just to tell me how bad i played. 

In that matter I wanna hear about your experiences and opinions on that topic :)
Should i take people like that serious?

Sry for sounding so insecure but I had a long day man

replies.body: A losing streak isn't usual, but if the streak is do to you in every game you need to consider how to adjust and play differently. Also a break can sometimes help.

Just think if ''Are they right?'' so watch your replays or think what you did wrong today in your previous games.

Sometimes people can be right so I take that criticism and change it into perfection. (i try to)

Don't let people make you doubt Nor make you feel down because that's part of the ''Tilt'' so keep on going bro.
Rule 20: Nothing is to be taken seriously.

Nah, your in plat, so you are in like what.... top 1%? Everyone has bad games and bad matches, even challengers.

Just pop on some music and let the ragers rage. Their temper will make them drop more than you keeping a cool head.

They also will get banned if you report them and they do it enough. Who would be the bad one then?
